body.name: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Easy Fold Travel Double Baby Stroller and 2 Single Infant Car Seats Travel System with Safety Harnesses and Cover, Khaki
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 9 hrs 58 mins.
features: Bundle including (1) infant and toddler double twin stroller and 2 car seats from Sit N Stand ensures safety, comfort, and convenience for your family's journeys
Double stroller's front and rear seats are designed to accommodate up to 2 infant car seats for parents with twins or two young children; Compatible with the included Baby Trend infant car seats
Car seats accommodate weights between 4 to 35 pounds and up to 30 inches tall; Include a deluxe seat pad and reversible infant insert specially designed to cradle the child
Features 5-point safety harnesses with 1-hand adjustment and height-adjustable seat back, eliminating harness re-threading; Designed with EPS energy-absorbing foam and an adjustable 2-panel canopy
Due to the substantial size and dimensions of the items contained within this package, your order will be dispatched in several separate boxes, which could result in staggered delivery dates
body.description: Give yourself and your baby a comfy and convenient travel experience with a versatile solution ideal for parents with multiple young children. The Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller and 2 Car Seats bundle is the go-to key for making family on-the-go travel seamless. This versatile stroller has multiple seating options that can accommodate up to 2 Baby Trend infant car seats by quickly clicking them directly into the child's tray. The front seat has a removable 2-panel fully ratcheting canopy, and the rear seat has a fixed canopy with visors to block the sun. Including a hassle-free 1 hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your traveling necessities, and a parent console with 2 cup holders with a covered compartment, you'll be able to travel with everything you need for an exciting day. For little ones weighing up to 35 pounds and 32 inches long, the infant car seats feature a 5-point safety harness with a simple 1-hand adjustment and push-button release, 4-position height adjustment, and a height-adjustable seat back for a secure and snug fit. This flexibility allows your family to adapt to various scenarios, from tired toddlers who need rest to independent youngsters who prefer to stand and explore. Ensure your child's ultimate safety while traveling and keep them safe and sound with the Double Baby Stroller with 2 Single Car Seats from Baby Trend.

Adjustable 2-panel canopy. 5-point safety harness with easy one-hand harness adjustment and push-button release. Cozy Cover provides extra warmth and comfort. Next page 1 Anti-Rebound Protection 2 Canopy 3 5-Point Safety Harness 4 Cozy Cover

The Baby Trend Ally 35 Infant Car Seat provides the latest innovations in safety, design and comfort. This infant car seat has a 35 pound maximum infant weight rating and comes equipped with a deluxe seat pad and reversible infant insert. For added security, Ally 35 is engineered with higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection. Other safety features include a 5-point safety harness with one-hand adjustment, a 4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators and a 6-position crotch belt adjustment.
4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for your new babies. It's easy to assemble and light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto porque es súper ligero tengo unas gemelas y para mi fue la mejor inversión que hiceSolo me hubiera gustado que el asiento delantero se reclinara un poco más para que cuando duerme el bebe fuera más cómodoPero aún así es una excelente compraMe encanto 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⚠️⚠️HEADS UP PLEASE READ⚠️⚠️
reviews.reviewText: So I bought this for my sister as a gift, she absolutely loves them HOWEVER she just delivered her twin girls 2 days ago and I am out trying to find new cars seats because their weight is too light for these car seats. The smallest one is a little under 5 lbs so these car seats don't accomidate small twins. I am back on here now to see if they even list the weight minimum and maximum and they don't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall Good Unit
reviews.reviewText: As a mother of NICU twins this stroller/carseat set I had big expectations for. Honestly, the carseats have been very good. Have been able to bring my 4lb twins home from the NICU with it, it passed the carseat tests with them and has been lightweight to carry. They are easy to put in and out of the truck without any issues. The partial covers that come with them automatically is lovely.The only big issue with it is that they are missing one piece (red latch) on the stroller to hold the front carseat from falling. It wasn't in the packaging so I haven't been able to use the stroller for both twins at the same time.
